model_answer: B: The user adds a music track via the Add Music dialog (choosing “Billboard_Eponymous_01.mp3”) and applies a fade-in to the music.

The audio statements that can be heard during the editing process are:

A: A female speaker describes a model using local materials and local sun, wind, and rainfall, integrating natural ecosystems into urban areas. (This statement occurs before the editing process begins.)

B: A male speaker says, “that’s all fine,” but adds that the city park needs to come last in the sequence. (This statement is made after the editor has switched the clip speed and before the music starts playing.)

C: A male speaker notes there is a gap at the start of the music and says it will need to be fixed later. (This statement is made after the music has started playing and before the editor returns to the interview.)

Therefore, the correct answer is: A, B, C
